TopicTitle: Sarah III (Two kerbals to Mun in under 100 parts!) By Zokesia Skunkworks!

Articles.Content:
The Sarah III

under 100 parts, carries two kerbals to Mun, land, and come back.

Everything is on staging, no action groups, only thing you have to do is manually undock the lander.

*Lander needs both Kerbals on it to balance it, but it is able to operate without kerbals if necessary.

CRAFT FILE: http://www./?xixbgkbw274kgvg

Gallery:

I love everything about this. I love the two man spacecraft, I love the launcher, I love the idea of using seats instead of a command pod. I might have to copy you-- I mean reverse engineer.

Does the lander have any torque?
yes, enough. It's not quick but it's not sluggish. I'd say it's perfect.

When there's a (x) III, I need to know the (x) I and (x) II.

must...see...Sarah I and Sarah II.

Naten Innovation is not responsible for any naming accidents. If you paint over an "I" or two, it's not my fault that it crashes because of unbalance.
Meanwhile in orbit of Jool...
